entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
